website_summaries.verdict: Combines attractive, cast iron workmanship with ample space for fires plus a great view; but it also comes with some quality control and longevity concerns.
pros: Attractive cast iron construction with rustic appeal
Wire mesh provides 360-degree view of fires
cons: Reports of damaged components upon arrival
Although it comes with a log grate, it's flimsy and prone to breakage with typical use

customer_reviews.title: It looks great, but
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, but... I purchased this item on Amazon on July 17, 2017. Since the end of July I used it few times to burn tree branches. Now, September 9 2017, I found that fire pit grid is already cracked in many places and few bars fell out. It also looks like that the protection (cage) metal screen is also begins to burn out, and the metal mesh on the top of the chimney is already crumpled. In general, this is very low quality product made of improper materials.
customer_reviews.author: DAD

customer_reviews.title: Smoke goes everywhere BUT the chimney, and the grates are junk
customer_reviews.text: Smoke goes everywhere BUT the chimney, and the grates are junk. This does not do a good job capturing smoke and moving it up the chimney - it is essentially just a fire pit with mesh around the sides of it. The grates are also junk, they feel like cast iron, but they broke after 1 fire - we burned a fire in it for about 4 hours and in the morning when I went to clean it out, these grates were both broken, cracked, and had a piece fallen out. Save your money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: HG

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Ive seen some bad reviews on this stove, it has worked fantastic for us. We have had ripping fires, and the grate did not melt.The outside has not rusted, only thing,I used different bolts. I purchased stainless steel bolts, because it is sitting outside.I would suggest, that if you purchase this do the same. Home Depot,sells them fairly cheap. Good little stove.
customer_reviews.author: D Mac

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look promising
customer_reviews.text: Haven't even assembled it yet, but disappointed with what I saw unboxing it. A couple of large chunks of paint were already flaked off the chimney base and raw metal exposed. After hitting the raw edges with a putty knife.....MORE paint came off (see photo). Will need to be painted even before I can begin assembly. Not sure how that's going to work out because the paint is a blend off black and gold and will be very difficult to replicate.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Benaski

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown in the photo
customer_reviews.text: Metal grate not cast iron just made of thin wire welded. Will not last. Chimney flue not made of cast iron, fabricated sheet steel. Photo is incorrect and quality not not the same as previous version from years ago. Returned not worth the money, price keeps going up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one like this a few years ago. Quite a difference between thn and now. My old one was heavy as hell, because it was all cast iron. This cheap, thin, flimsy metal isn't even close to the same quality. The first use all the paint burned off. My old one still has it's original paint on the body. The screen burned off as expected. I don't recommend this until they beef it back up. =(
customer_reviews.author: MarcR

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Chinese GARBAGE
customer_reviews.text: We had the exact same style chimney and just assumed they were the same. When we got this it’s a third of the weight of our other one (which has lasted 14 years). This one is already starting to look rusty - this thing is literally a piece of junk - don’t waste your time - don’t be fooled. You will have to paint it if you don’t want it to rust within four weeks. Unfortunately China 🇨🇳 continues to create knock-off version’s of good products and this is just another stellar example... ( shame on me for buying from China - guess I got exactly what I deserved!!!)
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Zero Complaints
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without damage and was easy to assemble. One hole was slightly obstructed with left-over metal from the casting process, but was easily cleared by tapping the bolt through the hole with a small hammer. I purchased and used all stainless-steel bolts, lock-washers over fender-washers (at interior), and nuts to ensure good connections and used the fender washers to spread the applied force of the fasteners. A great, inexpensive option for a small patio. Zero complaints, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not like it used to be.
customer_reviews.text: Newest version uses sheet metal for chimney stack instead of true cast iron. Won’t hold up over time. Casting for other cast iron components is now much thinner. Again won’t hold up over time. Metal mesh wire is too thin now and bends much easier than the old version of this product. Product will probably look and be great for 1-3 years max. My old one lasted 12 years before parts started to rust beyond repair.
customer_reviews.author: Muldor Havinski

customer_reviews.title: Get out your electric drill
customer_reviews.text: Get out your electric drill and go get replacement hardware BEFORE you begin assembly. The metal is quite heavy, but the holes don't quite line up and the supplied hardware is crap. Several bolts/nuts would not event start to thread. The product is a good size (handles several fire logs) and when finally assembled is sturdy. Cheap stuff for a not so cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: Capn Dar

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Box came like it was kicked the whole way instead of a vehicle!! Missing 2 legs and all the hardware. Not happy. Now waiting on how long parts take to get here
customer_reviews.author: H. P.

customer_reviews.title: Will know more later
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a very sturdy piece and an attractive addition to the patio. One problem from the moment we opened it though. Out of the box the paint was chipping and flaking off. So much so that after we got it together I had to sweep up the paint chips. There were large chips coming off the inside and small flakes coming off the entire thing. We will see how long the paint lasts once we have a few fires burning in it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Just love this! High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I just love this. It is the right size. Some reviews had a different chimnea sitting on bricks. This one is just the right height. I also like that you can see all around and through it and it's metal and not clay. I think you have to maintain the clay with oils (not sure). High Quality and I would recommend purchasing. I also bought the suggested cover.
customer_reviews.author: K. Bruning

customer_reviews.title: Where are replacement parts?!
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine Aug 2017 therefor only 2 years of use before the bottom rusted out. This is NOT worth the value for the money. It is nice looking and will miss it on my patio. This company needs to have replacement parts since this is a common issue.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Kreiselmeier

customer_reviews.title: Did everything right, but it still rusts
customer_reviews.text: I bought the cover, the pad that goes underneath, used stainless steel screws instead of the ones that it came with, and the darn thing still rusted in the first rainstorm that it wasn't covered. There's rust spots everywhere: on the lid, on the grate, on the legs and everywhere in between. The next thing to try will be a coat of Rustoleum. Not sure how heat tolerant that stuff is, but I guess I'll find out.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Olmstead

customer_reviews.title: Packaging Needs Improvement
customer_reviews.text: The item was delivered on time, easily assembled and works great. I would have given 5 stars if not for the flimsy packaging used to ship my chimenea. I had to "hammer out" several areas mesh that were crushed and the ash tray was bent to the point that it was almost nonfunctional. Totally not what I expect from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Smoke goes everywhere except up the flue
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but the flue doesn't draw the smoke up thus the smoke blows everywhere making it impossible to sit around and enjoy even when there is little wind. I would not recommend. We had a previous clay chiminea that didn't have the 360 fire view and we will purchase that one again. This one looks nicer but the other more enclosed chiminea works so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great looking chiminea
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this chiminea, especially the 360 degree fire view. We’ve used it about 10 times so far. The shipping box was heavy, but we opened it on the porch and carried individual pieces to where we wanted to place it for assembly. It was easy to assemble. I deducted one star because the handle on the sliding firebox door broke off immediately on the first use.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Woods-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd time buying this fireplace. My first was about 8 years ago, but being outside all that time it got pretty rusted. This time I painted the whole thing with black heat paint first, so it will certainly last even longer. And I pack some mean little bonfires in there! My one complaint, or ask, is that I could be sent another hook. (Part #8) because it snapped in two when I tightened the bolt. So if you could send that it would be much appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic item! It arrived on the day posted
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic item! It arrived on the day posted, in excellent condition and very easy to assemble. This is the first chimenea I have found that truly is made of "Cast Iron", it is heavy duty and with care looks like it will last for years to come. Just remember, it is cast iron so do not over tighten the nuts and screws...you are assembling a chimenea, not tightening the lug nuts on your car, go easy. Lee.
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: Heavy-duty Chiminea
customer_reviews.text: Looks good. Was easy to assemble. Well packed with all the nessasary hardware PLUS one extra nut! 360 degree fire view is nice, especially when the smoke goes up the chimney and straight up the heat plume so it doesn't drift into your face.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: need replacement
customer_reviews.text: The chimenea arrived today in one box and the top was damaged. When I took out all the parts there were three small broken pieces on the bottom of the box. As I unwrapped the parts I found the top (item #3) is where those pieces broke off from. There is also complete break in the top, from top to bottom. I would like a replacement for the top, as it sets now it is useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: BLG46

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks very classy
customer_reviews.text: Well made, especially at this reasonable price. Easy to assemble and looks very classy......I have it out in my front planter area, cabled-down to prevent theft. Works well......except that, because of the 360 degree "cage," most of the smoke does not go up the stack. I believe this would be somewhat an issue around small children or pets.
customer_reviews.author: CR Mainwearing

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my back yard
customer_reviews.text: I use this chiminea all the time. Love that I can see the fire from all angles. Big enough to hold 18 inch logs without problems. Easy to put together and so fun to enjoy......
customer_reviews.author: Adam Kroos

customer_reviews.title: Damaged. Poor packaging and components
customer_reviews.text: Product is quite beautiful and appears durable. However, there is almost no care when packaging. Foam only protects the cast iron chimney. The mesh grate and ash tray are severely damaged. A hammer helps bring them, back to shape, but for the price, one would expect something more
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Q

customer_reviews.title: Discount because pre-owned does not mean good quality
customer_reviews.text: The box was smashed to smithereens when it showed up. Upon opening the box the product was also smashed and missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Pj

customer_reviews.title: It is just "okay."
customer_reviews.text: Product was as described. 3 stars...grate inside is on 2 pieces. One piece was much shorter and did not fit. We had to rig it up with a bolt to get it to stay. 3 stars...rusted in 2 months with just a handful of rains. It's all rusty orange except the legs at this point. I suggest you buy a cover, paint and seal possibly with a high heat paint.
customer_reviews.author: smiley1

customer_reviews.title: I would not buy this again. Pretty but!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed. Because I was under the impression it was cast iron. It is not. Plus the bowl of the wood burning area is not as big as the one I replaced it with. The wind will knock this over. I gave my old cast iron one away and I want it back. Sorry it looks great but does.not heat as well and poorly put together with the screw holes. Lots of gaps!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie  Jo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chimenea
customer_reviews.text: Love it. As one reviewer recommended, I bough 30 split washers (5/8 th inch size) to use with the nuts and bolts. Makes the whole assembly much more solid. Assembly took approx 20 mins max. One other tip, consider another wire grate under the two piece grate that comes with the chimenea. The grate supplied has rather large holes and embers drop into the grate too soon in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: johnfin361

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last past 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Rust and rot after 3 years and replacement parts not available. Ash tray and the grates. Even had it covered in the weather.. smoke leaks out everywhere. Not too impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Joe L

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy
customer_reviews.text: Product came in with broken pieces. Way too heavy for the UPS guys so I assume they were not gentle. I have called the Kay Home products customer service but have not heard back yet. I do not recommend this product. I would expect a better response from the customer service group
customer_reviews.author: Mark I

customer_reviews.title: Grating not Nearly strong enough
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this chiminea for the price it was except for the grill. The grill will inevitably get hot and it bends in any direction. Turned it upside down, used it two or three times, bent past level back the other way. The heating needs to be beefed up big time.
customer_reviews.author: RichF

customer_reviews.title: Visually impressive!
customer_reviews.text: Visually, it is an excellent chimenea for the money. It was easy to put together and I did add lock washers that some reviewers suggested to all of the bolts. The instructions were easy to follow and it took less than an hour to put it together. I would have rated it 5 stars but the two grates that sit in the bottom are not snug fitting. I look forward to firing it up this fall.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is hard!!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a pain in the A@#!! Parts didn't align and had to use force to get it to assemble .. I wish I would have returned it. !!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Cnimenea fire pit
customer_reviews.text: for the cost, this is a very nice Chimenea. Thankfully my husband is able to fix anything and everything. the only issue we had was, the holes for the screws did not line up at all. therefore, he redrilled holes and a few extra making the chimenea very sturdy when he was finished. we enjoyed our first fire in. all our company loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen E. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for the price
customer_reviews.text: My goal was to have a chimenea that would serve my outdoor fire experience. I bought it for the price and positive feedbacks. I'm planning on bringing this indoor once fall and winter comes around to prolong the life of the fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Divaforeva

customer_reviews.title: Good and Bad
customer_reviews.text: The stove itself is nice, the first use the grill grate cracked, to big to send back and there is no contact for the seller. We don't think they tempered the grill grate, just hope the stove itself doesn't start to crack.
customer_reviews.author: Nob (Bon)

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this if you want it to look nice after the first few weeks
customer_reviews.text: We received this fire pit 4 weeks ago and have used it 3 times. It looked nice in the box. And it was easy to assemble. But now it's already covered in rust on the outside. See picture. It cost way too much to be rusting out in just 4 weeks. I am guessing it will fall apart and be unusable within a few months. Don't waste your money on this!
customer_reviews.author: Weezy Girl

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, cheap product
customer_reviews.text: Horrible, cheap product. Dented and poor quality. The box looked like it had been thru a cyclone. It was cheap and certainly I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value and Quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this was perfect. Easy to assemble and much larger than expected. The cast leaf designs in the iron are a nice visual touch. The ash tray and lower bowl will collect water, so throw a cover over it if there is rain.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Jon

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Bought it as a father's day gift for my dad. He loves how sturdy and easy to assemble it was.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Avery

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: A favorite addition to our patio. Vents well, pulling any smoke up through the chimney.
customer_reviews.author: Shelleygirl

customer_reviews.title: the product itself looked to be nice but the box had been opened we could tell ...
customer_reviews.text: the product itself looked to be nice but the box had been opened we could tell and there were only 2 legs and the ash pan was damaged so we sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Earlene F Pulliam

customer_reviews.title: 360 view
customer_reviews.text: Easiest to assemble with 2 people but 1 can do it. Great 360 degree view for all to sit around it. Only drawback are the grates. They are cheap and twisted after first fire but still useable. Easy to clean ashes out. This is my 2nd one and would buy the same again.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Don't load too much wood at a time.
customer_reviews.text: We use the chimenea for a relaxing time in the evening.
customer_reviews.author: Solstice

customer_reviews.title: Grates are cheap wire not cast iron
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for the same model we had for 10 years that held up great. The grates for the wood on this model are cheap wire grates not cast iron like the old. These wire grates will not last. Too expensive to be replacing every couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: rusts easily but works great
customer_reviews.text: it's very functional and a nice looking piece but it rusted after one week of use.
customer_reviews.author: consultant1

customer_reviews.title: Nice for small patios
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly. I was able to assemble this item in less than 30 minutes with a single tool and have already used it a couple times. Nice for small patios!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn A Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Works as good as it looks!
customer_reviews.text: It beat my expectations and arrived in record time. My husband put it together and we love it. The removable door is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Elly J

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item! relatively easy to put together, study, HEAVY, and has added much needed ambiance to by back porch. Perfect for chilly evenings. You won't regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Helena C. Hough

customer_reviews.title: Puts out heat in a nice radius.
customer_reviews.text: Product functions very well. The thinly cast bottom pan hairline cracked when assembling. Didn't overtighten for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this item because of the mesh screen all the way around, which allows viewing the flame from all sides. It's very heavy and sturdy, and so far has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Weston

customer_reviews.title: ... together due to the design but besides that we love it. Everything works as it should and we ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit difficult to put together due to the design but besides that we love it. Everything works as it should and we have no issues
customer_reviews.author: NM

customer_reviews.title: Lots of smoke comes through the back of the chimenea ...
customer_reviews.text: Lots of smoke comes through the back of the chimenea. Hoped more would go through the top to keep the smoke away. Not thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: MICHELLE ARAGON

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Had it shipped to HI and it does the job better than any other one I have had. Also I bought the cover. It is very sturdy and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: In cold weather my brother and I have a fire each afternoon. We already "killed" one chimenea! We ordered this one for a replacement and it is great! It is really heavy and well made! We have enjoyed it already!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Coyle

customer_reviews.title: Great patio fireplace
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a patio. Love that it is open all the way around, so easy for several to gather around it to keep warm. Easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: D. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of it sitting on our patio. Haven't used it yet. The screw holes were a little tricky, since they didn't line up real well. My husband did buy washer to use with the screws. That went well. I would recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy E.

customer_reviews.title: a nice chimenea ... used about 3 times and so far ...
customer_reviews.text: For the money, a nice chimenea ... used about 3 times and so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: After 3 uses grate broke
customer_reviews.text: Grate broke in less than 2 months with only 3 uses. Product no longer available on Amazon. I would like the company to provide a replacement piece.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Sgarlato

customer_reviews.title: Lots of sheet metal
customer_reviews.text: More sheet metal than i expected. My old one had more cast iron. But in the picture, they looked the same. I’m sure it won’t last as long as the old one.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together made of cast iron so very durable. And just pleasant to sit around on a cool evening with a warm fire going. Beautifully made.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Part was delivered broken
customer_reviews.text: Broken part was delivered. It’s extremely heavy, and I have to return. :(
customer_reviews.author: makeawish

customer_reviews.title: Love the style
customer_reviews.text: Better then we thought it would be. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Best fire pit I’ve ever had Just make sure not to tighten until the end, and tighten them all evenly.
customer_reviews.author: mark angler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the backyard
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty cast iron. Well vented for a fast start fire
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Daily

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it. It looks cute in my campsite. Very easy to put together, great quality for the money too.
customer_reviews.author: SJTopaz

customer_reviews.title: Fireplace perfect for back yard
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect venting for smoke and 360 view of ire.
customer_reviews.author: Annie T

customer_reviews.title: As expected, just did not fit the space.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected. Just didn't work in our space so I sold it. Nothing wrong with it except the space it was in.
customer_reviews.author: Chris N.

customer_reviews.title: ... a house warming gift for a friend it seems good and heavy duty to me and he likes it ...
customer_reviews.text: All I Did was put it together it was a house warming gift for a friend it seems good and heavy duty to me and he likes it alright never heard any thing negitive from him... All I know is that We had a HELL of a FIRE and drank a lot of BEER that night... I highly recommend this PARTY POT (FIRE POT)100%. ENJOY...
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Chimnea
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift product came 4weeks late the bottom grill warped on first fire and started rusting almost instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Damaged in shipping but still excited to use
customer_reviews.text: Dry disappointed to find that the mesh stove part was badly dented in shipping. We didn’t notice it until we started putting it together and had already broken down and thrown out the packaging. But we’re still excited about using it, though!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Sliding ash drawer makes cleaning easier. Log grate elevates logs providing air circulation under the fuel for easy lighting. Outside surface is heat/rust resistant paint. Use smaller stove-cut logs for best results.
customer_reviews.author: MHS

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely excellent Chimenea. It's easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely excellent Chimenea. It's easy to put together, and its open design with moveable screen makes loading logs and enjoying the fire very nice and easy. It's not clay, so no worries about cracking, and the little rust that has developed so far adds character. We've used this chimenea probably around ten times since we bought it and are very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jegier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together but the grates in the bottom do not fit right. Still I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift - looks great and was what he
customer_reviews.text: Not put together yet. Christmas gift - looks great and was what he wanted
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very nice the vertical stack help keeps the smoke moving up and away
customer_reviews.text: Very nice the vertical stack help keeps the smoke moving up and away
customer_reviews.author: Lefty

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Getting a little rusty but still works great on my patio!
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Coating is peeling after one use
customer_reviews.text: We used this once and put the cover on it. I just took the cover off and am very disappointed to see that the coating is peeling off.
customer_reviews.author: Norma C

customer_reviews.title: just needs locking washers
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad item for the price! Please note: goto Lowes if you buy this and get LOCKING WASHERS or this thing will wiggle itself apart. Other than that its great.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Love this but !
customer_reviews.text: I love this but had two fires and the metal grate melted or broke , logs don't fall thru but it's annoying
customer_reviews.author: Sean McIlvried

customer_reviews.title: Gets smokey
customer_reviews.text: With or without a breeze much of the smoke does NOT go up through the flue.
customer_reviews.author: poseidon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love our new purchase! Can't wait for cooler temperatures to enjoy it more.
customer_reviews.author: BJW

customer_reviews.title: It's cool
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 2 years, now need ash pan and bottom grate.. vendor please contact me
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Damagaged
customer_reviews.text: The cast iron hood is cracked is there anything you all can do about it?
customer_reviews.author: Candace Felty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Went together well. I did put lock washers on every bolt.
customer_reviews.author: Biker Chick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small fires in the evening. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome through the winter
customer_reviews.text: Large and Solid! Awesome through the winter! Not hard to put together just heavy! Love it alot!
customer_reviews.author: Tom K

customer_reviews.title: excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, attractive, and very sturdy. Color is a nice antique bronze with some scrolling noted. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: bobbyinpa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pit. Holds up outside and can take the
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pit. Holds up outside and can take the heat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product as a gift. The recipient said it was a bit difficult to put together, as some of the pieces don't fit together well for the sliding door. It started to rust a bit after being left out, but it is a nice big size. If you purchase, be sure to also purchase a cover for it or find a dry place for it in a garage maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Attractive functional portable fireplace
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to assemble. After reading other posts, I was careful not to over tighten the bolts and I had no problems. Wood burns very nicely in this unit and it is big enough for a decent size fire.
customer_reviews.author: Brandybucks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for s’mores!!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the one we had, exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: BigD

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to outdoor living space....
customer_reviews.text: This is fun! We are enjoying the chemenea and wish there were fewer "no burn " days. All the parts were here and in good shape. My husband followed the advice in one review and had the extra washers ready. It went together in about 45 min. Do keep it out of the rain as the ash catcher pan can also catch water and rust. The cover is probably a good idea , and we are going to get one .
customer_reviews.author: Ann Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything we were looking for! Fire visible all around and tool to slide door is an added bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made, sturdily built. We put a cover over it for its first winter.
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: Sonora Cast Iron Chiminea
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Chiminea after having the same model for 5 plus years. I used it to burn fallen branches and to have occasional fires. It served me well and only had to replace due to rust, which was expected. I would shop again with Amazon without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cerasuolo

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the bad reviews
customer_reviews.text: Purchased cautiously due to some poor reviews. Ignore them. This is awesome! You won't find anything better for twice the price. Simple to assemble. Follow excellent instructions and don't tighten screws until all the holes line up. Hand tighten screws. The last hole on the upper chimney would not line up. Drilled a new hole. Easily done. Throws out the heat. BIG! Great look and impressive. Box is heavy, don't carry alone.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love sitting in front of this. So warm and relaxing. So happy I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Jass28

customer_reviews.title: great for outdoor parties
customer_reviews.text: We were having our holiday party and we were expecting more guests than anticipated. We needed the extra outdoor space and figured this would make for a more welcoming atmosphere to entice our guests outdoors in the cold. It worked and was wonderful. Just be careful how close wood gets to the sides. Even though it is enclosed a breeze can blow the flames outside a good distance.
customer_reviews.author: sg

product_meta.title: Deckmate Sonora Outdoor Chimenea Fireplace Model 30199
product_meta.description: Sturdy cast iron outdoor artisan chimenea fireplace features a rubbed bronze finish. Cap on top to keep out rain . Convenient sliding door for adding fuel. For burning wood and and artificial logs. 51.6-inches high. For outdoor use only
feature_bullets: Designer embossed cast iron construction and high temperature paint finish
Full 360 degree view of fire with fine wire mesh spark screen
Large sliding door for adding fuel and an ash catcher for easy cleanup
Log grate and fire tool included
Great addition to any backyard yard or patio
For burning wood and artificial logs
